The contractor may return to do final work, but once this phase of work is completed, the work area will shift.

This project removes broken concrete slabs and adds new concrete pavement to lanes with pavement that is more than 50 years old. Caltrans is working with Metro on a final design for HOV lanes and extensions of truck lanes in this area of I-5 under a separate project in 2019.

This is a 2-year project to replace distressed pavement that is 6 months into construction. Calgrove to the 14 is being worked on right now. The work is also done overnight to minimize impact on traffic. The work areas will shift as work is completed.
